articles.title: India's Gautam Adani: Asia's richest man weathering stock market panic - CNA
articles.description: Shares in the business empire of Asia's richest man Gautam Adani nosedived after a US investment firm claimed it had committed "brazen" corporate fraud.
articles.content:
MUMBAI: Indian industrialist Gautam Adani is Asia's richest man, with a business empire spanning coal, airports, cement and media.
He is now rocked by corporate fraud allegations and a stock market … [+3848 chars]

articles.author: T. AVINESHWARAN
articles.title: Speedy Tigers end World Cup campaign on a winning note - The Star Online
articles.description: BHUBANESWAR: Malaysia have ended their World Cup campaign on a good note after beating Asian rivals Japan 3-2 in the 13th-16th classification game at the Birsa Munda Stadium in Rourkela, India on Saturday (Jan 28).

articles.title: Philippines connection suspected in spree of Japan home invasions - Nikkei Asia
articles.description: Tokyo police seek extradition of four suspects, including possible ringleader
articles.content: TOKYO/MANILA -- Japanese police have asked the Philippines to extradite four men suspected of involvement in a three-month-long string of robberies across Japan, including a possible ringleader who g… [+267 chars]

articles.title: Species richness of bat flies and their associations with host bats in a subtropical East Asian region - Parasites & Vectors - Parasites & Vectors
articles.description: Background Understanding the interactions between bat flies and host bats offer us fundamental insights into the coevolutionary and ecological processes in host-parasite relationships. Here, we investigated the identities, host specificity, and patterns of ho…
